name: Sparkfactor
description:
Sparkfactor is a boutique advertising design and production firm located in Chicago. We have made a name for ourselves as an agency promoting Chicago businesses large and small, while also working with national brands. We create strategies to optimize a company’s marketing program. Utilizing web, print, video, email, social, content, photography, and inbound, we create messaging and materials that get noticed and connect with consumers. To keep ROI a priority and campaign engagement trending up, we are constantly measuring and tracking campaign progress. To see how we can work together, visit us at sparkfactor.com, or send us a note at connect@sparkfactor.com
